attributes.action: ensure the Armed Forces charity can buy and make necessary alterations to the house in Ashtead, Surrey to acommodate visiting relatives of injured servicemen/women rehabilitating at Headley Court.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is petty, selfish and totally unbelievable that local residents have raised an objection to this. Do they not realise that our servicemen/women risk their lives to protect them and freedom in Britain and around the world and not consider it reasonable that in return the injured can have their relatives visit them when they are going through rehabilitation!

Please intervene so that common sense and, more importantly, compassion prevails.

Thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
